definition: to store up/to grow (e.g. a beard)/to entertain (ideas)
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: Some might still be locked in aquifers and other form. ations beneath the surface.
sentences.chinese: 有些水也許還被鎖在蓄水層和其它地表以下的構造中。

sentences.english: The maximum value of shrinkage stress of slabs before water storage increased obviously compared with that in the end of concrete placement.
sentences.chinese: 蓄水前面板幹縮應力的峯值較澆築結束時明顯增大。

sentences.english: Many regions of the country are relatively flat, but underground cisterns exist.
sentences.chinese: 該國家的很多地區相對開闊，但地下蓄水池仍存在。

sentences.english: Info on the size of the solar and pumped water storage system is not available yet.
sentences.chinese: 太陽能系統和泵送蓄水系統的具體尺寸目前尚未公佈。

sentences.english: With the impounding of Three Gorges Project, study on this problem became urgent.
sentences.chinese: 隨着三峽工程完工蓄水，這方面的研究顯得愈加迫切。

sentences.english: Benefits of soil and water conservation was mainly studied after water retention was used in mountain orchard.
sentences.chinese: 主要研究了山地果園施用保水劑後的蓄水保土效益。

sentences.english: There is a water - retaining layer at the bottom of the flower trough which reduces irrigation.
sentences.chinese: 花槽底部有蓄水層，可減少澆水次數。

sentences.english: Less than 25% of the households have containers to store water.
sentences.chinese: 有蓄水容器的家庭不到25%。

sentences.english: The karst groundwater in this basin is controlled by the different type and scale of groundwater storing geological structures.
sentences.chinese: 該盆地岩溶水受不同類型和規模的蓄水構造控制。

sentences.english: Construction of main pier is affected by the third-stage of Three Gorges project.
sentences.chinese: 主墩施工受到三峽工程三期蓄水影響。

sentences.english: SECOND SOLDIER: It is an old cistern.
sentences.chinese: 那是一個古代的蓄水池。

sentences.english: As more blood is forced in, the tiny cavern swells .
sentences.chinese: 當更多的血擠進來時，微小的蓄水池就脹大。

sentences.english: Three Gorges Dam discharge may only last 15 days.
sentences.chinese: 三峽水庫蓄水量只能維持15天用水。

sentences.english: And the earth pressure before and after impoundment is analyzed qualitatively.
sentences.chinese: 並對心牆蓄水前後的土壓力進行了定性分析。

sentences.english: Xinjiang's Second Artillery Large-scale domestic water tank waterproof and anti-corrosion engineering.
sentences.chinese: 新疆二炮天山地下大型生活用水蓄水池防腐防水工程。

sentences.english: These animals act as the reservoir for the rabies virus and for its continued spread.
sentences.chinese: 這些動物擔當狂犬病毒的蓄水池並使他們繼續傳播。

definition: to pilot a ship/to channel water/to draw water (for irrigation)
Three Gorges Reservoir on the Changjiang or Yangtze
to have running water (in a house etc)
to dig out/to excavate/to scoop out
